description.narrative: Capacity enhanced at state and district levels for planning, implementation, budgeting and public financial management for most disadvantaged children., which contributes to Building Capacity For Evaluation, Cross-Sectoral Monitoring, Data And Situation Analyses, Evaluation And Research, Other Cross-Sectoral Programme Areas. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Evaluations, Research And Data, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Higher quality programmes through results-based management and improved accountability of results.

baseline.value: Quality Assurance guidelines yet to be developed

target.value: 2017:At least 5 key departments at the national and state level with QA guidelines

actual.value: 2014:Six submissions were identified as possible good practices as a result of a survey that ICO's Innovations Task Force conducted.
